To fidi kai to Oyranio Tokso  (1988):
Stin mythologia Voodoo, to fidi einai to symbolo tis gis.
To ouranio tokso einai to symbolo toy paradeisou.
Metaksi auton ton 2, zoun kai pethenoun ola ta plasmata...
Alla epeidi o anthropos exei psyxi, mporei na pagideutei sena tromero meros...
...opoy o thanatos einai mono h arxi.
"Zombienopoihsh"
Basismeno se alhthina istoria,
apo to omonumo biblio tou Wade Davis
